Text:
A bit stingy with the technical info Mr. Bone.
Yeh, I know: it's all in the screen-shot 1280x720 @ 2239 Kb/s.
It seems like an interesting movie, and smaller size than the previous release (720p.BluRay.x264-BRMP) which I presume is the source.
Thanks!
downloaded, but got "An invalid public movie atom was found in the movie" error when opened :(
